titleStmt.title: Foure great lyers, striuing who shall win the siluer whetstone Also, a resolution to the countri-man, prouing is vtterly vnlawfull to buye or vse our yeerly prognostications. Written by W.P.
titleStmt.author: Perkins, William, 1558-1602.

notesStmt.note: Against almanac writers Thomas Buckminster, Gabriel Frende, Thomas Twyne, and possibly John Dade.
Identified as STC 19080 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
